hadiths.text: It was narrated that Silah bin Zufar said:"I had Sahur with Hudhaifah, then we went out to the Masjid. We prayed the two Rakahs of Fajr, then the Iqamah for prayer was made, and we prayed

chapter.ara-name: باب تَأْخِيرِ السَّحُورِ وَذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى زِرٍّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Delaying Sahur and Mentioning the Differences Reported from Zirr about that
